info.title: MPEG-21 Smart Contracts for Media OpenAPI
info.description:
Context: This API definition is derived from the Smart Contracts for Media CD.
Scope: This API permits to obtain Media Contractual Objects that reference MPEG-21 CEL/MCO contracts
The API should be offered an MPEG21 Smart Contract for Media transformer implementation.
Authors: Mirko Zichichi and Víctor Rodríguez Doncel. Ontology Engineering Group. Universidad Politécnica de Madrid.

get.summary: Returns all the data of a contract object
Returns the ids of parties of a contract object
Returns all the data of a party object
Returns the ids of otherPersonUsers of a contract object
Returns all the data of a personUser object
Returns the ids of deontic expressions of a contract object

200.description: an array of deontic expression ids

get.summary: Returns all the data of a deontic object
Returns the ids of conditions of a deontic object
Returns all the data of a cel condition object
Returns the ids of deontic structured blocks of a contract object

200.description: an array of deontic structured blocks ids

get.summary: Returns the ids of deontics of a deontic structured block object

200.description: an array of deontic expression ids

get.summary: Returns the ids of actions of a contract object
Returns all the data of an action object
Returns the ids of objects of a contract object
Returns all the data of an object object
Returns the ids of facts of a contract object
Returns all the data of a fact object

contractRelations.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/contractIdref

parties.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/partyIdref

otherPersonUsers.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/personUserIdref

deontics.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/deonticIdref

actions.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/actionsIdref

objects.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/objectIdref

facts.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/factIdref

textClauses.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/textIdref

encryptedContractParts.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/encryptedIdref

operativePart.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/deonticStructuredBlockIdref

paragraphs.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/textIdref

preCondition.description: Map where keys are of type: #/components/schemas/conditionIdref

contractIdref.name: contractIdref
contractIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the contract to get

personUserIdref.name: personUserIdref
personUserIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the personUser to get

partyIdref.name: partyIdref
partyIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the party to get

deonticIdref.name: deonticIdref
deonticIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the expression to get

deonticStructuredBlockIdref.name: deonticStructuredBlockIdref
deonticStructuredBlockIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the expression block to get

actionIdref.name: actionIdref
actionIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the action to get

ipentityIdref.name: ipentityIdref

itemIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the ipentity to get

trackIdref.name: trackIdref

intervalIdref.name: intervalIdref
intervalIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the interval to get

objectIdref.name: objectIdref

factIdref.name: factIdref

textIdref.name: textIdref
textIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the text to get

conditionIdref.name: conditionIdref
conditionIdref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the condition to get

idref.name: idref
idref.description: Alphanumeric ID of the thing to get

personUser.description: a cel person or mco user object
